author: James Faust
message: If you take each challenge one step at a time, with faith in every footstep, your strength and understanding will increase.
title: Thought of the day

author: Denis Waitley
message: Happiness cannot be travelled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
title: Thought of the day

author: Hasidic saying
message: Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with all his strength.
title: Thought of the day

author: Joseph Campbell
message: When we quit thinking primarily about ourselves and our own self-preservation, we undergo a truly heroic transformation of consciousness.
title: Thought of the day
